mapper.select:
SELECT
from dj_basics_worker_goods ORDER BY create_date desc

select sum(wg.price*abw.shop_count) from dj_basics_worker_goods wg,dj_actuary_budget_worker abw where wg.data_status = 0 and wg.id = abw.worker_goods_id and abw.house_id=#{houseId} and abw.delete_state!=1 and abw.delete_state!=2 and abw.house_flow_id=#{houseFlowId}

select sum(wg.price*abw.shop_count) from dj_basics_worker_goods wg,dj_actuary_budget_worker abw where wg.data_status = 0 and wg.id = abw.worker_goods_id and abw.house_id=#{houseId} and abw.delete_state =3 and abw.house_flow_id=#{houseFlowId}

SELECT id, name, worker_goods_sn as workerGoodsSn, image, unit_id as unitId, unit_name as unitName, price, sales, other_name as otherName, work_explain as workExplain, worker_dec as workerDec, worker_standard as workerStandard, worker_type_id as workerTypeId, show_goods as showGoods, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate from dj_basics_worker_goods where data_status = 0
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND w.worker_type_id =#{workerTypeId}
ORDER BY create_date desc

SELECT id, name, worker_goods_sn as workerGoodsSn, image, unit_id as unitId, unit_name as unitName, price, other_name as otherName, sales, work_explain as workExplain, worker_dec as workerDec, worker_standard as workerStandard, worker_type_id as workerTypeId, show_goods as showGoods, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate from dj_basics_worker_goods where id =#{id} ORDER BY create_date desc
